events.title: Brew Day - Reminder - Batch #8 (SMaSH Simcoe)

notes.note: Added 10 grams Simcoe for dry hopping

batchHops.name: Simcoe (T90)
batchHops.notes: Extremely low co-humulone. High oil content. Very unique, pine-like aroma. Known as a bittering hop but with good aroma characteristics

batchYeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.
batchYeasts.name: Safale American

recipe.name: SMaSH Simcoe

hops.name: Simcoe (T90)
hops.notes: Extremely low co-humulone. High oil content. Very unique, pine-like aroma. Known as a bittering hop but with good aroma characteristics

yeasts.name: Safale American
yeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.

recipe.notes:
Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).
No minerals added (Ca = 5, Mg = 2, Na =3, Cl = 5, SO4 = 4, HCO3 = 17).
